testmod-Envy.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. While in hand, you cannot play Status and Curse. If no ememy intends to attack/ inflict a Negative Effect on you or defend/ use a buff, you cannot play Attact/ Skill/ Power.

testmod-Greed.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. At the end of your turn drawing this card, For each [E] remain, draw !M! fewer cards next turn. For each card in hand, gain !M! less [E] next turn.

testmod-Lust.NAME: Lust
testmod-Lust.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, lose !M! Strength, Dexterity, Focus, gain 3 Vulnerable, Weak, Frail.

testmod-Wrath.DESCRIPTION: When you draw this card, Apply !M! Angry to All enemies. While in hand, you can only play Attack. Ethereal.

testmod-AdversityCounterattack.NAME: Adversity Counterattack
testmod-AdversityCounterattack.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Artifact. Gain !M! Vulnerable and 1 Intangible. Deal the sum of enemy's Buff damage to a random enemy the sum of your Debuff times.

testmod-Arrangement.NAME: Arrangement
testmod-Arrangement.DESCRIPTION: Gain X Block. Deal X damage. Draw X cards. Upgrade X cards in your hand, for each Upgrade less, Gain [R] . Exhaust.

testmod-AssimilatedRune.NAME: Assimilated Rune
testmod-AssimilatedRune.DESCRIPTION: Increase base damage and block of cards in your hand to the maximum in your hand in !M! turns.
testmod-AssimilatedRune.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Increase base damage and block of cards in your hand to the maximum in your deck in !M! turns.

testmod-Automaton.NAME: Automaton
testmod-Automaton.DESCRIPTION: Whenever Auto-played, damage times +1 in this run. Damage times -1 in this combat. Deal !D! damage to random enemy !M! time.

testmod-BloodBlade.DESCRIPTION: Increase attack damage by current HP loss / Max HP. When lose HP, increase attack damage by HP loss / Max HP.

testmod-CardIndex.DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! cards to remove from this combat. For future play, play the chosen cards.

testmod-ChaoticCore.NAME: Chaotic Core
testmod-ChaoticCore.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Orb slot. Whenever you lose HP, Gain 1 Orb slot. If Orb slot has been full, or each your attack damage Channel !M! random Orb.

testmod-Collector.NAME: Collector
testmod-Collector.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Deal !M! additional damage for each relic you have.

testmod-ComboMaster.NAME: Combo Master
testmod-ComboMaster.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies !M! times. Increase the damage and times of this card by 1 this combat.

testmod-ConditionedReflex.NAME: Conditioned Reflex
testmod-ConditionedReflex.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP: Gain !M! Melleable; at the start of your next turn, make it active 1 time.

testmod-DeathImprint.NAME: Death Imprint
testmod-DeathImprint.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If target has Imprint, remove it and increase base damage by !M! % of its amount. Otherwise, give Imprint.

testmod-DisillusionmentEcho.NAME: Disillusionment Echo
testmod-DisillusionmentEcho.DESCRIPTION: The first card you play each turn will play NL X/ !M! more times.

testmod-Dream.NAME: Dream
testmod-Dream.DESCRIPTION: Add 'Infernal Blade', 'Distraction', 'White noise' and 'Discovery' into your hand. Which cost 0 this turn. Exhaust. Ethereal.
testmod-Dream.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add 'Infernal Blade', 'Distraction', 'White noise' and 'Discovery' into your hand. Which cost 0 this turn. Ethereal.

testmod-EnhanceArmerment.NAME: Enhance Armerment
testmod-EnhanceArmerment.DESCRIPTION: Your next Attack deal double damage. Exhaust it.

testmod-EternalityOfKhronos.NAME: Eternality of Khronos
testmod-EternalityOfKhronos.DESCRIPTION: End your turn, Take an extra turn after this one. Exhaust. Ethereal.
testmod-EternalityOfKhronos.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: End your turn, Take an extra turn after this one. Ethereal.

testmod-FightingIntention.NAME: Fighting Intention
testmod-FightingIntention.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, for each enemy intend to Attack, Gain !M! Strength, these enemies lose !M! Strength.

testmod-HandmadeProducts.NAME: Handmade Products
testmod-HandmadeProducts.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage of the product of all cards' cost in your hand. If kills enemy, increase this card's cost by !M! . Can be Upgraded any number of times.

testmod-HeadAttack.NAME: Head Attack
testmod-HeadAttack.DESCRIPTION: Change enemy's intention to next turn. Draw !M! cards. Ethereal.

testmod-Illusory.NAME: Illusory
testmod-Illusory.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards, all cards in draw pile become Ethereal. For each card was Ethereal, Gain [E]. Exhaust. Ethereal.

testmod-Librarian.NAME: Librarian
testmod-Librarian.DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! cards from X random Colorless to add in your hand. Reduce these cards'cost to 0 this combat. Exhaust.
testmod-Librarian.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! cards from X random Colorless to add in your hand. Reduce these cards' cost to 0 this combat. If win in the next X turn, add these cards in your deck. Exhaust.

testmod-LimitFlipper.NAME: Limit Flipper
testmod-LimitFlipper.DESCRIPTION: If last card you play is 'Limit Flipper', double your Strength. Otherwise Gain !M! Strength.

testmod-Mystery.NAME: Mystery
testmod-Mystery.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. For each ? room you entered this run, deal an extra damage. Exhaust.

testmod-PainDetonator.NAME: Pain Detonator
testmod-PainDetonator.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage of !M! % of HP Loss of the target ( !D! ).

testmod-PulseDistributor.NAME: Pulse Distributor
testmod-PulseDistributor.DESCRIPTION: When you would receive n damage which is not type Lose HP, don't lose HP. Instead, in the next n+1 times of enemies turn end, lose 1 HP.

testmod-RabbitOfFibonacci.NAME: Rabbit of Fibonacci
testmod-RabbitOfFibonacci.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Upgrade this card in this combat. Can be Upgraded any number of time.

testmod-Recap.NAME: Recap
testmod-Recap.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play the last !M! cards you played last turn.

testmod-Reflect.NAME: Reflect
testmod-Reflect.DESCRIPTION: In this turn, you will play the next !M! cards twice except Curse and Status.

testmod-RepeatForm.NAME: Repeat Form
testmod-RepeatForm.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card and remove it this combat. At the start of your turn, add a copy of it into your hand. Ethereal.
testmod-RepeatForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card and remove it this combat. At the start of your turn, add a copy of it into your hand.

testmod-Reproduce.NAME: Reproduce
testmod-Reproduce.DESCRIPTION: Innate . Choose a card, make it Retain, goes back hand when played, increase its cost in turn by !M! .

testmod-Reverberation.NAME: Reverberation
testmod-Reverberation.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card except Curse or Status Exhausts, function it !M! times. Ethereal.
testmod-Reverberation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card except Curse or Status Exhausts, function it !M! times.

testmod-SelfRegulatingSystem.NAME: Self Regulating System
testmod-SelfRegulatingSystem.DESCRIPTION: The first buff you Gain each turn will receive !M! more. The first debuff you Gain each turn will receive !M! fewer.
testmod-SelfRegulatingSystem.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. The first buff you Gain each turn will receive !M! more. The first debuff you Gain each turn will receive !M! fewer.

testmod-ShutDown.NAME: Shut Down
testmod-ShutDown.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, add !M! 'Reboot' into your hand.
testmod-ShutDown.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, add !M! 'Reboot+' into your hand.

testmod-Superconductor.NAME: Superconductor
testmod-Superconductor.DESCRIPTION: In this turn, you can Gain no [E] , reduce the cost of all cards in your hand to 0. Reduce cost of next X cards you draw which greater than 0 by 1 for one turn. Exhaust.
testmod-Superconductor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: In this turn, you cannot Gain [E] , reduce the cost of all cards in your hand to 0. Reduce cost of next X cards you draw which greater than 0 by 1 for one turn.

testmod-TaurusBlackCat.NAME: Taurus' Black Cat
testmod-TaurusBlackCat.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you deal non-Lose-HP damage to enemy, all enemies lose !M! % of the damage HP in total.

testmod-TemporaryDeletion.NAME: Temporary Deletion
testmod-TemporaryDeletion.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card, remove the same Rarity cards from deck this combat.At the start of turn, add a same Rarity random card into your hand. Ethereal.

testmod-TradeIn.NAME: Trade In
testmod-TradeIn.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust any number of cards in your hand, then draw that many cards, reduce the cost of all cards in your hand by !M! and make them Exhaust on play. Exhaust. Ethereal.

testmod-TreasureHunter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Choose a card from 3 random Rare card add into your hand. Exhaust.
testmod-TreasureHunter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Choose a card from 3 random Rare card add into your hand. If Fatal, add it into deck. Exhaust.

testmod-VirtualReality.NAME: Virtual Reality
testmod-VirtualReality.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Lose Block by amount of Block you gained last turn.

testmod-Wormhole.NAME: Wormhole
testmod-Wormhole.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your draw pile, discard pile or cards in your hand. Play the chosen card and Exhaust it.
testmod-Wormhole.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your draw pile, discard pile or cards in your hand. Play the chosen card. If it is Curse or Status, Exhaust it.
